game.name: Desktop Mascot ~ Tasmon's Little Island
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Steam Achievements, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Raise a mysterious creature "Tasmon" on your desktop!! No need to pay attention constantly, enjoy interacting with them in your free time. Once it has grown enough, you can challenge simple auto battles. The Tasmon's appearance upon birth will depend on what you do on your PC
